ingredients.item: 2 x 140g pack essential Waitrose Wafer Thin Roast Chicken, shredded
Zest and juice of ½ essential Waitrose Lemon
½ x 25g pack mint, leaves chopped

instructions.step: Cook the whole potatoes in boiling water for 15-20 minutes until tender, drain and cool.
Meanwhile, mix together the remaining ingredients.
Coarsely grate the potatoes and gently mix into the slaw. Season to taste.
